description:
Adlet is a reckless 18-year old who uses secret tools as a means of attacking, and describes himself to be the strongest man alive. In order to be chosen as one of the Six Braves, he enters (forcefully) into the consecrated martial arts tournament held in the Kingdom of Pienna, but is named the "cowardice warrior" from his fighting style.
Source: Official Page
name: Adlet Maia
